protocol.text: Arabidopsis thaliana, Columbia-0 ecotype, was used in all experiments. Seeds were sterilized with ethanol 70% (1 min),  0.85% sodium hypochlorite (10 min) and rinsed with sterile water (6 times). Seedlings were grown on  Murashige and Skoog half-strength medium (agar 0.8%) containing 30 mM sucrose. The plates were incubated in the dark at 4째C for two days (vernalization, to promote homogeneous germination) and then transferred to 23째C for seven days under light/dark 12/12 photoperiod before the treatments. Seedlings were grown under aerobic conditions.
This sample represents aerobic wt Col-0. Arabidopsis seedlings, 7d-old.
This sample represents hypoxic wt Col-0. Arabidopsis seedlings, 7d-old.
This sample represents hypoxic 35S::HRE1 Col-0. Arabidopsis seedlings, 7d-old.
This sample represents aerobic transgenic 35S::HRE1. Arabidopsis seedlings, 7d-old.

Total RNA was extracted from whole 7-day old plants using the RNeasy kit (Qiagen). RNA quality was assessed by agarose gel electrophoresis and spectrophotometry. RNA was processed for use on Affymetrix  Arabidopsis Genome GeneChip arrays.

Seedlings were grown on Murashige and Skoog half-strength medium (agar 0.8%) containing 30 mM sucrose. The plates were incubated in the dark at 4째C for two days (vernalization, to promote homogeneous germination) and then transferred to 23째C for seven days under light/dark 12/12 photoperiod before the treatments. Seedlings were grown under aerobic conditions.
This sample represents aerobic transgenic 35S::HRE2. Arabidopsis seedlings, 7d-old.

Total RNA was extracted from whole 7-day old plants using the RNeasy kit (Qiagen). RNA quality was assessed by agarose gel electrophoresis and spectrophotometry. RNA was processed for use on Affymetrix Arabidopsis Genome GeneChip arrays.
